from tms import TMS from z3 import * def ex1(): tms = TMS() na = tms.create_node("a") nb = tms.create_node("b") nc = tms.create_node("c") nd = tms.create_node("d") ne = tms.create_node("e") nf = tms.create_node("f") ng = tms.create_node("g") tms.justify_node("j1", nf, [na, nb]) tms.justify_node("j2", ne, [nb, nc]) tms.justify_node("j3", ng, [na, ne]) tms.justify_node("j4", ng, [nd, ne]) tms.enable_assumption(na) tms.enable_assumption(nb) tms.enable_assumption(nc) tms.enable_assumption(nd) return tms.maxsat() print(ex1()) def ex2(): tms = TMS() na = tms.create_node("a", probability=0.9) nb = tms.create_node("b", probability=0.9) nc = tms.create_node("c", probability=0.9) nd = tms.create_node("d") ne = tms.create_node("e") nf = tms.create_node("f") ng = tms.create_node("g") tms.justify_node("j1", nf, [na, nb]) tms.justify_node("j2", ne, [nb, nc]) tms.justify_node("j3", ng, [na, ne]) tms.justify_node("j4", ng, [nd, ne]) return tms.maxsat() print(ex2()) def ex3(): tms = TMS() na = tms.create_node("a", probability=0.9) nb = tms.create_node("b", probability=0.9) nc = tms.create_node("c", probability=0.9) nd = tms.create_node("d") ne = tms.create_node("e") nf = tms.create_node("f") ng = tms.create_node("g") tms.justify_node("j1", nf, [na, nb]) tms.justify_node("j2", ne, [nb, nc]) tms.justify_node("j3", ng, [na, ne]) tms.justify_node("j4", ng, [nd, ne]) r1 = tms.maxsat() tms.retract_node(ne) r2 = tms.maxsat() return (r1, r2) print(ex3()) def ex4(): tms = TMS() na = tms.create_node("a", probability=0.9) model = tms.maxsat() assert model == {"a": True} return model print(ex4()) def ex5(): tms = TMS() na = tms.create_node("a", probability=0.9) nb = tms.create_node("b", probability=0.4) nc = tms.create_node("c") tms.add_constraint("j1", lambda xs: Implies(And(xs[0], Not(xs[1])), xs[2]), [na, nb, nc], probability=0.9) model = tms.maxsat() assert model == {"a": True, "b": False, "c": True} return model print(ex5()) def ex6(): tms = TMS() na = tms.create_node("a") nb = tms.create_node("b") nc = tms.create_node("c") tms.justify_node("j1", nc, [na, nb]) tms.enable_assumption(na) tms.enable_assumption(nb) r1 = tms.maxsat() tms.enable_assumption(na, value=False) r2 = tms.maxsat() return (r1, r2) print(ex6())
from llm_mystery import solve story_lines = [ ('Fiona Duncan', 'mean', True, 0.2), ('Fiona Duncan', 'opportunity', True, 0.4), ('Fiona Duncan', 'motive', False, 0.0), ('Colonel Barrow', 'mean', True, 0.4), ('Colonel Barrow', 'mean', False, 0.6), ('Colonel Barrow', 'opportunity', True, 0.4), ('Colonel Barrow', 'motive', False, 0.6), ('Abby Grant', 'mean', False, 0.6), ('Abby Grant', 'opportunity', True, 0.2), ('Abby Grant', 'motive', True, 0.4), ('Harold Duncan', 'mean', False, 1.0), ('Harold Duncan', 'opportunity', False, 1.0), ('Harold Duncan', 'motive', False, 0.2), ('Maurice Eades', 'mean', True, 0.0), ('Maurice Eades', 'opportunity', True, 0.0), ('Maurice Eades', 'motive', False, 1.0)] print(solve(story_lines))
